      • queryBooksByCondition

        public java.lang.Object[][] queryBooksByCondition(java.lang.String request,
                                                  Book book)
        Query books' info by the specific filter condition from the server
        Parameters:
        request - QUERY_BOOKS_BY_TITLE or QUERY_BOOKS_BY_AUTHOR or QUERY_BOOKS_BY_CATEGORY or QUERY_BOOKS_BY_KEYWORD of QUERY_ALL_BOOKS
        book - Request content object
        Returns:
        The books' info array or null

      • downloadBookByIsbn

        public byte[] downloadBookByIsbn(java.lang.String request,
                                 Book book)
        Download book from server by the book's isbn number
        Parameters:
        request - DOWNLOAD_BOOK_BY_ISBN
        book - Request content object
        Returns:
        Book byte data or null

      • uploadBookFile

        public boolean uploadBookFile(java.lang.String request,
                              byte[] fileData)
        Upload the book byte data to the server
        Parameters:
        request - UPLOAD_FILE
        fileData - Book byte data
        Returns:
        true - upload successfully or false
